Question
========

Of 8 subjects, before and after a given exertion of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 8 differences between before and after measurement the mean is 25 and the standard deviation is 30. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 0.83
* 1.4
* 2.36
* 12.91

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.83: Incorrect
* 1.4: Incorrect
* 2.36: Correct
* 12.91: Incorrect
